challenge.title: Fun with Frequencies
challenge.author: Subhayan RoyMoulick, Dan Myshkin, Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description:
You are given a file that has been encrypted with a substitution cipher using some key permutation P. And a mysterious ciphertext, that has also been encrypted with the same key permutation P. Everything you need to know is explained in the challenge.
Your Objective: give us the decryption of the mysterious ciphertext, should you choose to accept it.
